channel.title: HTTP GZIP Compression remote date and time leak
channel.description:
Website doesnt support TLS:
http://jcarlosnorte.com/security/2016/02/21/date-leak-gzip-tor.html
But can be viewed here with TLS:
https://web.archive.org/web/20200608115442/http://jcarlosnorte.com/security/2016/02/21/date-leak-gzip-tor.html

item.title: HTTP GZIP Compression remote date and time leak
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
Yes it is, if we can have small table of why hidden services inside
Whonix served better than inside any other OS.

This is prevented inside Whonix as it use sdwdate/UTC by default.

Patrick via Whonix Forum:

Read full topic
item.source: HTTP GZIP Compression remote date and time leak
